alert.note: Alert for Elmore; Montgomery (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 08 at 1:46PM CDT until July 08 at 2:15PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Elmore County in east central Alabama... North central Montgomery County in south central Alabama... * Until 215 PM CDT. * At 145 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Elmore, or near Millbrook, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Northeastern Montgomery, Millbrook, Wetumpka, Elmore, Coosada, Deatsville, Eclectic, Santuck, Bob Woodruff Lake, Weoka Mills, Emerald Mountain, Jordan Lake, Ten Cedar Estates, Blue Ridge, Dexter, Claud, Holtville, Wetumpka Municipal Airport, Jordan Dam and Wallsboro. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
